title: The best video games of 2022 so far
description: These are the best games of 2022, so far, on mobile, Switch, PlayStation and Xbox, starting with Wordle and Elden Ring.

title: ‘Breath of the Wild’ sequel ‘Tears of the Kingdom’ revealed by Nintendo
description: Nintendo revealed the title of its next Zelda game, "Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom" during a company live stream.

title: Discord is now on Xbox for everyone, but setup takes a few steps
description: The popular voice chat app is now available on the Xbox console, but it won't be a one-click experience.

title: Live updates: Twitter whistleblower Peiter Zatko testifies before Congress
description: Twitter whistleblower Peiter Zatko's responses to lawmakers could provide further evidence that could add to Twitter's legal and political problems.

title: What TikTok and Facebook may track with their in-app browsers
description: Meta and TikTok are spinning up ‘custom browsers' equipped with potential key loggers, a researcher warns. Here's how concerned to be and what you can do to keep your data safe.
